Abilities - Class in <Unnamed>
Class that defines abilities.
Abilities(String, String, int, int, int, int, int, int, boolean, Ability_Effect, double, boolean) - Constructor for class Abilities
 
Abilities(Abilities) - Constructor for class Abilities
 
ability_buttons_enable(List<JButton>, boolean) - Method in class MainFrame
Enables / disables every ability button
ability_buttons_toggle(List<JButton>) - Method in class MainFrame
Turns ability buttons enabled/disabled, based on their cooldown timers, or special conditions.
ability_buttons_turn(List<JButton>) - Method in class MainFrame
Turns ability buttons visible/invisible, and modifies their name based on player ability array.
Ability_Effect - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Ability_Effect(String, int, int, int, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class Ability_Effect
 
Ability_Effect(Ability_Effect) - Constructor for class Ability_Effect
 
ability_list - Variable in class Database
List of all Abilities
ability_to_weapon - Variable in class Database
List of lists: Player gains abilities based on weapon he holds; this list contains lists of all abilities that are granted by each weapon; Each of weapon is next list: Sword, Spear, Shield&Broad, Axe, Hammer, one-hand-sword, fists, just Sheld; Each of those list contains pairs, first element is level when player gets ability, and second element of pair is ability he gains.
agility - Variable in class Player
Determines who attacks first, and is used for calculating dodge chance
ai_mood() - Method in class Encounter
Chooses which ability ai will use.
apply_chance - Variable in class Ability_Effect
Effect's chance to be applied to target

Armor

armor_pen - Variable in class Abilities
Ability armor-penetration modifier
armor_per_lv - Variable in class Enemy

attack_power - Variable in class Enemy
Enemy's Strength
attack_power_per_lv - Variable in class Enemy
Enemy's strenght he gains per level by scaling with player's level
automatic - Variable in class Event
If true, than even is automatic launched, when player sets foot inside of cell with this event.
avoidance - Variable in class Ability_Effect
Determines if target will try to avoid attack(1- parry, 2- dodge, 3- block, 4- deflect)
